Name: My Cute Fuhrer
About the game: My Cute Fuhrer – a satirical anti-war visual novel with a “match3”-type gameplay. This game does not contain non-tolerance, any symbols of any political organizations and anything like that. Only love and mutual understanding. Make Match3, not war ♥ Meet the cute and shy Fuhrer . She loves making beautiful paintings and dreams of realizing her global plans. But she has no friends and no one takes her seriously. Fuhrer’s main dream – is to meet a close and loving person… and to take over the world. Spend this evening in a company of cute girls . Use your charm to melt their hearts ♥ Classic gameplay and incredibly interesting story. You are a secret agent . The best secret agent. You are devilishly smart, talented and charming. Your main objective is to neutralize the Fuhrer, but can you really do this? Features: Anti-war love story Cute girls in military uniforms Unusual story Classic gameplay: match3 and visual novel Lofi hip hop by G374
